pageContext.claim: “When an old Wall at the Southern Border, that is crumbling and falling over, built in an important section to keep out problems, is replaced with a brand new 30 foot high steel and concrete Wall, the Media says no new Wall has been built. Fake News! Building lots of Wall!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appears to be responding our fact checks on the wall with this tweet. Congress had made it clear that the money cannot be spent on the concrete wall that Trump promised during the campaign; the money for the barriers could be used only for items listed as “primary pedestrian levee fencing,” “primary pedestrian fencing” and “secondary fencing.” He tries to suggest that a concrete levee, with bollard fencing, is the same thing. But it is not.
